game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity is on the brink of extinction after an alien invasion.
game.ending: The player's choices lead to one of two possible endings, either saving humanity from extinction or succumbing to its demise.
game.synopsis:
In "Echoes of Eternity," players take on the role of a resistance fighter in a world where an advanced alien force has decimated human civilization. The game is set 20 years after the invasion and takes place in a sprawling metropolis that serves as a last bastion for humanity.

The player must navigate through the ruins, scavenging for resources and recruiting allies to aid in the fight against the alien threat. Along the way, they uncover a cryptic message from an unknown source claiming to have information about the invasion's true purpose.

As players delve deeper into the mystery, they discover that the aliens are not mindless invaders but are instead searching for something hidden on Earth - a powerful technology capable of manipulating time itself. The player must decide whether to prioritize finding this technology or focusing on defeating the alien forces head-on.

Throughout their journey, the player encounters various characters who aid or hinder their progress. These include former scientists trying to unlock the secrets of the ancient technology and rogue military units attempting to exploit it for personal gain.

As the stakes grow higher, players must navigate complex moral dilemmas, forge alliances with unlikely allies, and make sacrifices that will determine the fate of humanity. Will they choose to save their species or succumb to its inevitable demise?
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
